long_description: A full-zip version of the original Mountain Hardwear pullover designed for speed alpinist Uli Steck, the men's hooded Quasar Jacket is waterproof, windproof and breathable for your spring climbing. Dry.Q(TM) Elite 3-layer ripstop nylon starts breathing the minute you put it on. Weighs in at only 13 oz. to keep your load light. Helmet-compatible hood offers a single-pull adjustment system. Internal zip pocket holds keys, ID and other small items. Also features an internal drop-in pocket and zippered hand pockets. Mountain Hardwear Quasar Jacket for men has an adjustable hem and cuffs to seal warmth in, weather out.
short_description: A full-zip version of the original Mountain Hardwear pullover designed for speed alpinist Uli Steck, the men's hooded Quasar Jacket is waterproof, windproof and breathable for your spring climbing.
